title: Click the Launch Button on the Client and it wont show up with the Login Screen
body: Can Anyone help me with this problem i don't know what happened but i clicked on the Launch button on the client and no login screen came up. Then i went to task manager and i see that league is still opened but nothing is showing up for me any help please??

replies.body:
Dose the league icon show up on the task bar after clicking launch? i know it disappears to start with. 
If not try, 
1. Running league as admin, right click league icon >> run as admin
2. try some of the steps in this redit post. http://dt.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1lps3z/if_client_is_not_starting_heres_the_fix_enjoy/

Ok i Figured out the Problem

Instructions:
1) Go to start menu and then click "Computer"
2) Click on your local C: drive
3) Go to "Riot Games" folder
4) Go to "League of Legends" folder
5) Go to "lol.launcher.admin" and double click (Make a Shortcut if you want)

And it should Take you to the Loading screen
If not Try to uncheck the peer to peer transfer in the Client Settings

These are just what worked for me
^^
Hope it Helps and have a great day :D
I have the same issue. Only started happening today. So far, i've tried everything in the reddit link posted before - nothing yet though.
Easy to fix. Just close the Lol Client in Processes and then reopen the client.
Yea i did that but still has the same problem
